nodes.text: Missa was a female individual who served as the lady-in-waiting of the noblewoman Lady Kalena. During the Galactic Civil War, Kalena and Missa were traveling aboard the corvette Indupar Nova when the vessel was boarded in the Ec Pand system by Rebel privateers, and Kalena and Missa switched places, in an attempt to protect Kalena. However, Captain Urias Xhaxin of the privateers saw through the deception and he ordered Kalena and Missa to be held in comfort aboard his ship, the Free Lance.
